text: Walking in Circles is an album of rock band FliT. Released on December 19, 2017, the album consists of 9 songs. This is a re-released English version of their album that was extremely popular in Ukraine a few years ago.https://www.eventbrite.com/e/5k-miles-ex-flit-new-album-premier- tickets-37815406900# 5k Miles (Ex Flit) New album premier == Track listing == == Personnel == * Volodymyr Novikov — guitar, vocals * Igor Ozarko — drums, backing vocals * Roman Boyko — bass guitar, backing vocals == References == Category:2017 debut albums
title: Walking in Circles (album)
